allow: Bash(for file in cardsScreen.new.ts menuScreen.new.ts missionScreen.new.ts settingsScreen.new.ts)

Bash(do sed -i "s|import { Platform, setPlatform, View, Text, Image, Pressable, UINode, Binding } from ''../../../../bloombeasts/ui'';|import { View, Text, Image, Pressable, UINode, Binding } from ''../ui'';|g" "$file")
